item.title: Links and References
item.description: Links and data sources that I like to use or reference when researching or discussing different topics and geographic or statistical concepts. Databases census.gov NOAA Datasets Waterpoint Data (WPDX) Humanitarian Data Exchange (OCHA) Relief Web Labs (OCHA) Taxonomy as a Service (OCHA) Data.gov - Ocean Data Saildrone Data Galapagos Vital Signs Resources UNICEF Data Awesome Public Datasets (GitHub) Geographic leaflet (r) SymbolixAU/mapdeck (r) globe4r (r) Gravity/Huff model tools Natural Language Processing Statistics 10 Things to Know about Confidence Intervals Bootstrap Confidence Intervals (R) Calculating Line Regression by Hand Central Limit Theorem (Stat Trek) Confidence Intervals Covariance Analysis (ANCOVA) Demystifying Bayesian Deep Learning (Eric J.
